title: Chapter 1: Introduction to AI and Agent Architectures
description: Describe AI and its applications to understand the foundational concepts of artificial intelligence and the various types of agent architectures.

title: Chapter 2: AI Foundations and Terminologies
description: Apply foundational AI concepts by learning key terminologies and principles that underpin artificial intelligence.

title: Chapter 3: Search Algorithms: Uninformed & Informed
description: Implement search algorithms, exploring both uninformed and informed techniques used in problem-solving within AI.

title: Chapter 4: Constraint Satisfaction Problems
description: Solve Constraint Satisfaction Problems (CSPs) using backtracking algorithms to handle complex problem-solving scenarios.

title: Chapter 5: Multi-Agent Systems
description: Analyze the dynamics of multi-agent systems and the interactions between multiple AI agents.

title: Chapter 6: Game Playing Algorithms
description: Apply minimax and alpha-beta pruning strategies in the context of game playing algorithms.

title: Chapter 7: Logic Reasoning: Propositional Logic
description: Implement propositional logic in AI to formalize reasoning processes and decision-making.

title: Chapter 8: Logic Reasoning: First-Order Logic
description: Utilize First-Order Logic (FOL) for reasoning tasks, enhancing the expressiveness of logical statements in AI.

title: Chapter 9: Probabilistic Reasoning
description: Apply Bayesian networks for probabilistic reasoning, allowing AI systems to manage uncertainty.

title: Chapter 10: Introduction to Decision Making
description: Differentiate between various decision theories and understand their applications in AI decision-making.

title: Chapter 11: Markov Decision Processes
description: Use Markov Decision Processes (MDPs) for decision making in stochastic environments.

title: Chapter 12: Reinforcement Learning Basics
description: Implement basic reinforcement learning algorithms to understand learning through interaction with the environment.

title: Chapter 13: Machine Learning Fundamentals
description: Understand the differences between supervised and unsupervised machine learning techniques and their applications.

title: Chapter 14: Deep Learning Basics
description: Explore the fundamentals of deep learning, focusing on neural networks and their architectures.

title: Chapter 15: Project Work & Revision
description: Collaborate on projects and revise key materials in preparation for the final presentations.

title: Chapter 16: Project Presentations & Final Review
description: Present projects to the class and conduct a comprehensive review of the key concepts covered throughout the course.
